description.para: Base wrapper class for managing effects (Particles, Sound) through SEffectManager

This is just a base class, not intended for direct usage
ScriptInvonkers for certain events

briefdescription.para: Event used when Start was called.
Event used when Stop was called.
Event used when the actual effect started playing.
Event used when the actual effect stopped playing.
Whether the Effect cleans up after itself when stopped.
Whether the Destroy process has already been called.
Whether the Effect is currently playing.
Cached parent.
Cached world position.

description.para: Data filled in by SEffectManager to identify it when it is registered

briefdescription.para: ID of effect, given by SEffectManager when registered (automatically done when playing through it)
Whether the effect is registered in SEffectManager.

description.para: Cached settings set through 'SetAttachment...' methods Does not necessarily reflect the current state when EffectParticle

briefdescription.para: Cached local pos.
Local orientation set by SetAttachedLocalOri, only used by EffectParticle.
ctor
dtor
init

description.para: Information about what type of effect the Effect is, without the need for casting

briefdescription.para: Get what type of effect the Effect is.

simplesect.para: EffectType What type of effect the Effect is

briefdescription.para: Check whether the Effect is EffectSound without casting.

simplesect.para: bool Whether the Effect is EffectSound

briefdescription.para: Check whether the Effect is EffectParticle without casting.

simplesect.para: bool Whether the Effect is EffectParticle

description.para: Methods to Play/Stop Effect Generally, SEffectManager.Play methods are used instead of Start

briefdescription.para: Plays all elements this effects consists of.

simplesect.para: Is called by SEffectManager.Play methods

briefdescription.para: Validation whether an effect truly started playing or if the Effect should stop as none is present.

simplesect.para: Override this when inheriting to create own validation check
Is called from Event_OnStarted invoker after Event_OnStarted has been performed

briefdescription.para: Stops all elements this effect consists of.

simplesect.para: Alternatively use SEffectManager.Stop( effect_id )

briefdescription.para: Returns true when the Effect is playing, false otherwise.

description.para: Various events that can be overriden for custom behaviour

briefdescription.para: Event called on frame when enabled by SetEnableEventFrame(true)

simplesect.para: Called from SEffectManager.Event_OnFrameUpdate in MissionGameplay.OnUpdate

parameterdescription.para: float Time passed since the previous frame

briefdescription.para: Event called from SEffectManager when the Effect is registered.

simplesect.para: Should only ever be called by SEffectManager!

briefdescription.para: Event called from SEffectManager when the Effect is unregistered.

simplesect.para: Should only ever be called by SEffectManager!

briefdescription.para: Event used when EffectParticle.CheckLifeSpan was called (DEPRECATED)

simplesect.para: So this is EffectParticle specific...
EffectParticle.CheckLifeSpan is currently not in use

description.para: Setters and getters for generic data and properties

briefdescription.para: Set parent of the Effect.

simplesect.para: Same as SetAttachmentParent, but more generic name
Only sets the cached variable, for immediate effect use SetCurrent variant

parameterdescription.para: Object The parent for the Effect

briefdescription.para: Set current parent of the managed effect.

simplesect.para: Same as SetAttachmentParent, but more generic name

parameterdescription.para: Object The parent for the Effect
bool Whether to update the cached variable

briefdescription.para: Get the current parent of the managed Effect.

simplesect.para: Object The current parent of the managed Effect

briefdescription.para: Get the world position of the Effect.

simplesect.para: Only gets the cached variable, for immediate effect use GetCurrent variant
vector The world position of the Effect

briefdescription.para: Set the current world position of the managed effect.

parameterdescription.para: vector The current world position for the Effect
bool Whether to update the cached variable

briefdescription.para: Get the current world position of the managed effect.

simplesect.para: vector The current world position of the managed effect

briefdescription.para: Set the local position of the Effect.

simplesect.para: Only sets the cached variable, for immediate effect use SetCurrent variant

parameterdescription.para: vector The local position for the Effect

briefdescription.para: Get the local position of the Effect.

simplesect.para: Only gets the cached variable, for immediate effect use GetCurrent variant
vector The lcoal position of the Effect

briefdescription.para: Set the current local position of the managed effect.

parameterdescription.para: vector The current local position for the managed effect
bool Whether to update the cached variable

briefdescription.para: Get the current local position of the managed effect.

simplesect.para: vector The current local position of the managed effect

description.para: The ID of the effect when registered in SEffectManager

briefdescription.para: Set the ID registered in SEffectManager.

simplesect.para: Should only ever be called by Event_OnRegistered!

briefdescription.para: Get the ID registered in SEffectManager.

simplesect.para: int ID registered in SEffectManager, or 0 (SEffectManager.INVALID_ID) when not registered

briefdescription.para: Get whether this Effect is registered in SEffectManager.

simplesect.para: bool Whether this Effect is registered in SEffectManager

description.para: Data to attach an Effect to a parent Mostly replaced by equivalents without 'Attachment' in name Mildly deprecated, exist for backwards compatibility

briefdescription.para: Set parent for the Effect.

parameterdescription.para: Object The parent for the Effect

briefdescription.para: Get the parent set by SetAttachmentParent.

simplesect.para: Object The parent set by SetAttachmentParent

briefdescription.para: Set local pos for the Effect relative to the parent.

parameterdescription.para: vector The local pos relative to the parent

briefdescription.para: Get the local pos set by SetAttachedLocalPos.

simplesect.para: vector The local pos set by SetAttachedLocalPos

briefdescription.para: Set local orientation for the Effectparticle to attach to when the Effect is started.

simplesect.para: Only caches it into a variable to be used by Start, does not live update when called afterwards
Overrides the orientation set by EffectParticle.SetOrientation

parameterdescription.para: vector The local orientation to use on Start

briefdescription.para: Get the local orientation set by SetAttachedLocalOri.

simplesect.para: Is not necessarily the current local orientation
vector The local orientation set by SetAttachedLocalOri

briefdescription.para: Enum to determine what type of effect the Effect is.
Plain Effect base.
EffectSound.
EffectParticle.
